hero.title: Hand Crafted Pet Accessories
hero.description: Discover unique pet accessories meticulously crafted with embedded NFC technology, combining style with advanced functionality.

products.title: Explore the most loved Pet Products!
products.title_secondary: Take a look at our stunning collection of handcrafted pet products and find the the perfect match for your furry friend.

testimonial.title: I love the peace of mind that comes with knowing my pet's information is always accessible. The quality and design is also lovely! Pawsitive Collar has truly thought of everything!

about.title: About our Unique Pet Collars
about.about_description:
At Fashionable Pet Collars, we are passionate about creating stylish and safe pet collars.
 Each collar comes with an NFC Tag software solution that displays your pet's information when scanned.
 Handcrafted with love for your beloved pet.
about.block_1: Stand out with our trendy and fashianable pet collars
about.block_2: Keep your pet safe and secure with our advanced NFC Tag software
about.block_3: Never worry about losing your pet again, thanks to our innovative technology

reasoning.title: Why choose us?
reasoning.title_secondary: The reason why pet owners choose our handcrafted pet accessories with NFC technology for their beloved pets.

ctasection.title: Ready to upgrade your pet's accessories?
ctasection.title_secondary: Explore our collection of handcrafted products and give your pet the gift of safety and style.

contact.name: Name
contact.title: Get in touch
contact.paragraph: Have a question or feedback? Drop a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible
